label: Google Cloud Cortex Framework for Oracle EBS

branding.tagline: Common operational dashboards for data replicated from Oracle EBS into BigQuery leveraging Cortex Framework content.

CONNECTION_NAME.label: Connection Name
CONNECTION_NAME.description: Value of the BigQuery CONNECTION_NAME allowing Looker to query the Cortex Framework REPORTING dataset.

GCP_PROJECT_ID.label: GCP Project ID
GCP_PROJECT_ID.description: The GCP project ID where the deployed Cortex Framework REPORTING dataset for Oracle EBS resides in BigQuery.

REPORTING_DATASET.label: Reporting Dataset Name
REPORTING_DATASET.description: The deployed Cortex Framework REPORTING dataset where the Oracle EBS tables and views reside within the GCP BigQuery project.
